name: socialx_react_native
description: Monorepo for the SocialX distributed mobile app and its library ecosystem

scripts.precommit: yarn run lint:check && yarn run test
scripts.reset:rn: watchman watch-del-all && rm -rf /tmp/metro-bundler-cache-* && rm -rf /tmp/metro-cache-* && rm -fr /tmp/react-* && rm -rf /tmp/haste-map-react-native-packager-* && rm -rf /tmp/haste-map-metro-*
scripts.build:commons: cd packages/commons/ && yarn run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:api-storage: cd packages/api-storage/ && yarn run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:api-blockchain: cd packages/api-blockchain/ && yarn run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:api-data: cd packages/api-data/ && yarn run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:webview-crypto: cd packages/webview-crypto/ && yarn run build && cd ../../
scripts.build:database: cd packages/database/ && yarn run build && cd ../../
scripts.test:commons: cd packages/commons/ && yarn run test:all && cd ../../
scripts.test:all:api-storage: cd packages/api-storage/ && yarn run test:all && cd ../../
scripts.test:all:api-blockchain: cd packages/api-blockchain/ && yarn run test:all && cd ../../
scripts.test:all:api-data: cd packages/api-data/ && yarn run test:all && cd ../../
scripts.test:all:database: cd packages/database/ && yarn run test:all && cd ../../
scripts.test:all:RNSocialX: cd packages/RNSocialX/ && yarn run test:all && cd ../../
scripts.test:changed:commons: cd packages/commons/ && yarn run test && cd ../../
scripts.test:changed:all:api-storage: cd packages/api-storage/ && yarn run test && cd ../../
scripts.test:changed:all:api-blockchain: cd packages/api-blockchain/ && yarn run test && cd ../../
scripts.test:changed:all:api-data: cd packages/api-data/ && yarn run test && cd ../../
scripts.test:changed:all:database: cd packages/database/ && yarn run test && cd ../../

scripts.start:js: cd packages/RNSocialX/ && yarn run start:js && cd ../../
scripts.run:android: cd packages/RNSocialX/ && yarn run run:android && cd ../../
scripts.run:ios: cd packages/RNSocialX/ && yarn run run:ios&& cd ../../
